resources.string:
Good night, little Mozart 
Author and developer: Andrei Pisklenov 
Inspiration: Alice Pisklenova, my daughter 
If you like it, try our other apps

Application \"Good night, little Mozart\" is always ready to help you together with such famous composers as Mozart, Bach, Beethoven, Vivaldi and Brahms. Calming and relaxing classical music will give your baby the best dreams, full of joy, love, peace and warm-heartedness. Bring up your child to love musical masterpieces and enjoy world\'s cultural heritage. Who knows, maybe one day he will write his own symphony!
What to do with incoming calls
I\'m waiting for an important call, let\'s call with sound
Johann Sebastian Bach - Minuet in G from Anna Magdalena
Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart - Piano Sonata in C
Antonin Dvorak - Symphony No. 9, New World
Johann Sebastian Bach - Orchestral Suite No. 3 In D
Ludwig van Beethoven - Sonata No. 8, Op. 13 \'Pathetique\'
